name: datathings
description: Claude Code skills for GreyCat development, local LLM inference, numerical linear algebra, ggml tensor computation, NVIDIA CUDA, OpenCL cross-platform GPU/CPU parallel computing, AMD ROCm GPU computing, pandapower power systems analysis, power-grid-model distribution power system analysis, vLLM high-throughput LLM inference, and Ollama local LLM runtime

skills.name: greycat
skills.description: GreyCat full-stack development for graph-based language with built-in persistence

skills.name: greycat-c
skills.description: GreyCat C API and Standard Library for native development

skills.name: llamacpp
skills.description: Complete llama.cpp C/C++ API reference for local LLM inference

skills.name: blas_lapack
skills.description: Complete CBLAS & LAPACKE C API reference for numerical linear algebra

skills.name: ggml
skills.description: ggml C tensor library skill - graph computation, GGUF I/O, multi-backend inference, and ML training

skills.name: cuda
skills.description: NVIDIA CUDA C/C++ skill - Runtime API, cuBLAS, cuFFT, cuSPARSE, cuRAND, cuSolver, Thrust, and Cooperative Groups

skills.name: opencl
skills.description: OpenCL SDK C/C++ skill - cross-platform GPU/CPU parallel computing with C API, C++ wrapper, and SDK utilities

skills.name: rocm
skills.description: AMD ROCm GPU computing skill - HIP kernel development, rocBLAS/rocFFT/rocRAND/rocSOLVER libraries, profiling, and CUDA-to-HIP porting

skills.name: pandapower
skills.description: pandapower Python skill - power systems analysis with AC/DC power flow, OPF, short circuit (IEC 60909), state estimation, and network visualization

skills.name: powergridmodel
skills.description: power-grid-model Python skill - steady-state distribution power system analysis: power flow, state estimation, and IEC 60909 short-circuit calculations with batch and parallel computation

skills.name: vllm
skills.description: vLLM Python skill - high-throughput LLM inference with offline batch, OpenAI-compatible server, LoRA adapters, multimodal inputs, and structured outputs

skills.name: ollama
skills.description: Ollama REST API skill - run and manage local LLMs with chat, generate, embeddings, and custom model creation
